name: Defender_Ranged.Sonic_Attack
display_help: Sonic Attack lets you use the power of sound waves to damage and weaken your foes.

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Sonic_Attack.Shriek
powers.display_help: You let forth a quick Shriek, damaging your target and weakening their Damage Resistance. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: -20.00% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 5s on target

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Sonic_Attack.Scream
powers.display_help: Your Scream can cause serious damage to a target, while weakening their resistance to further damage. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast

display_info: 5 ticks of 4.77 smashing damage over 1.05s on target
5 ticks of 4.77 energy damage over 1.05s on target
5 ticks of 10.21 smashing damage over 1.05s on target
5 ticks of 10.21 energy damage over 1.05s on target
-20.00% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 7s on target

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Sonic_Attack.Howl
powers.display_help: A short range, but powerful sonic attack. Damage: Medium, Recharge: Moderate

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 50 ft. radius 30° arc (10 targets max)

display_info: -20.00% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 8s on target

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Sonic_Attack.Shockwave
powers.display_help: You can call forth a tremendous Shockwave that can knock down foes and deal some Smashing damage in a wide cone area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 50 ft. radius 30° arc (10 targets max)

display_info: 6.2 magnitude knock on target after 1s delay

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Sonic_Attack.Shout
powers.display_help: You blast your foe with a tremendous Shout, damaging them and reducing their Damage Resistance. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: -20.00% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on target

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Sonic_Attack.Amplify
powers.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long

display_info: 50.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Sonic_Attack.Sirens_Song
powers.display_help: You send forth a subsonic pulse which causes your foes to fall unconscious and take some minor damage. Your foes will remain unconscious for a good while, but will waken if disturbed. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 40 ft. radius 50° arc (10 targets max)

display_info: 3.0 sleep for 44.7s on target after 0.25s delay
3.0 sleep for 2s on target after 0.25s delay

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Sonic_Attack.Screech
powers.display_help: By bursting forth with this hypersonic Screech, you can disorient a target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

display_info: -20.00% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 12s on target

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Sonic_Attack.Dreadful_Wail
powers.display_help: Your Dreadful Wail is so strong that most foes will be defeated by being subjected to it. Dreadful Wail deals Extreme Smashing and Energy damage to all nearby foes in addition to reducing their defense and disorienting them for a good while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long

display_info: 72.29 smashing damage on target after 0.5s delay
72.29 energy damage on target after 0.5s delay
29.70 smashing damage on target after 0.5s delay
60.31 energy damage on target after 0.5s delay
-20.00% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 20s on target after 0.5s delay
